results.content: The course should be titled "Beginner Java with Eclipse".  The programming examples were too simple.  There was not a lot of information about using Eclipse.  Object Oriented programming section was merely a functional breakdown into classes.  No inheritance was used in the examples.  Kept using the dialog to get data.
